text: wlqd 'arsalna min qablik -ayha alrswl- rusulana 'iilaa qawmahum mubashirin wamundhirin ydewnhm 'iilaa altwhyd, wyhdhrwnhm min alshrk, fjawwhm balmejzat walbrahyn alsatet, fkfr 'aktharahum brbhm, fantaqamna min aladhin aktasabuu alsayiyaat mnhm, fahlknahm, wnsrna almuminin 'atbae alrsl, wkdhlk nafeal balmkdhbyn bik 'iina astmru ealaa tkdhybk, walam ywmnu
